name: The Birds Are Here
description:
An unfortunate town has been invaded by a flock of noisy birds!

Help the birds to dodge the stuff thrown at them by angry locals. Try to amass as many birds as possible through 4 rounds, and get a bonus multiplier for maintaining an equal balance of white and black birds.

  • Click on birds to select them, or click and drag to select multiple birds at once.
  • When birds are selected, click to move them to a location, or right click to deselect them.
  • Make it through 4 rounds with as many birds as possible!

My first completed game! Made for GE Jam #3, hosted by Game Endeavor.

Made with Godot. Art made in Aseprite, music made in Ableton Live, sound effects made in Bfxr.
